meanings.value: Nichang,  the Tang Dynasty song "Raiment of Rainbows and Feathers" 霓裳羽衣曲[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 qu1] or 霓裳羽衣舞[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 wu3]
meanings.traditional: ichang,  the Tang Dynasty song "Raiment of Rainbows and Feathers" 霓裳羽衣曲

meanings.value: nichang, rainbow colored clothes worn by the Eight Immortals 八仙[Ba1 xian1]
